Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Oak
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB via Clark, Chicago, and State; NB via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

Southbound buses will operate via  Clark, Chicago, and State. 

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green & Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland/Lake. Svc resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green & Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland/Lake

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
